#summary Meteo station on arduino.

= Meteo station on arduino =


== Project goals ==
Air Pressure
Humidity
Temperatures
Wind direction and speed
Voltage
Current

=== Hardware ===
Display - [http://www.dfrobot.com/wiki/index.php?title=Arduino_LCD_KeyPad_Shield_%28SKU:_DFR0009%29]

use pin - A0,D4-D9,D10 for backlight is not used

Arduino Mega 2560 - 
Ethernet shield - [http://arduino.cc/en/Main/ArduinoEthernetShield]
use pin - 

Screw shield - http://www.robotshop.com/dfrobot-arduino-compatible-screw-shield-4.html

=== Sensors ===
BMP085 - air pressure, air temperature
DHT11 - humidity and temperature
DS18B20 - temperature


=== Pinout ===

D0 Rx
D1 Tx
D2 DHT sensor 
D3 DALLAS I2C
D4 SS for SD card
D4-D9 display
D10 Ethernet shield
D11
D12
D13
A0 free reserved for rain sensor
A1 free reserved for anemometer (current sensor Holcik)
A2 free reserved for anemometer (voltage sensor Holcik)
A3 free reserved for light sensor
A4-SDA for BMP085 ATMEGA328  D20 for BMP085 ATMEGA2560
A5-SCL for BMP085 ATMEGA328  D21 for BMP085 ATMEGA2560
